summary: Dr. Fidelis F. Doh, M.D., was charged with unprofessional conduct and failing to meet appropriate standards due to inappropriate opioid prescribing practices and numerous prescription drug dispensing violations. Disciplinary actions include a reprimand, permanent revocation of his dispensing permit, permanent prohibition from prescribing controlled dangerous substances and certifying medical cannabis patients, a $20,000 civil fine, and probation requiring an ethics course.
